meanings.definition: Constructed with horizontal beams or lintels.
meanings.sent1: The trabeated roof of the house provided sturdy support.
meanings.sent2: The trabeated structure showcased the use of horizontal beams.
meanings.sent3: The trabeated design made the house look like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The trabeated architecture stood out like a bold stroke on the skyline.
meanings.sent5: The trabeated construction resembled a bridge connecting two worlds.

meanings.definition: Relating to a style of architecture using horizontal beams for support.
meanings.sent1: The trabeated entrance of the building was grand and imposing.
meanings.sent2: Architects often incorporate trabeated elements in their designs.
meanings.sent3: The trabeated facade gave the impression of a welcoming embrace.
meanings.sent4: The trabeated structure symbolized strength and stability.
meanings.sent5: The trabeated architecture evoked a sense of timeless elegance.
